comments.body: This is different to what the Akka Typed testkit does. Before adding this SLF4J wasn't fully initialised when this tried to access a logger.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@        // Wait for logging initialisation http://www.slf4j.org/codes.html#substituteLogger
        Thread.sleep(50)
        getLogbackLoggerInternal(loggerName, count - 1)
      case null =>
        throw new IllegalArgumentException(s"Couldn't find logger for [$loggerName].")
